issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Typo in DFSAdmin:

System.out.println("Allowing *snaphot* on " + argv[1] + " succeeded");
fields.summary: Fix typo in DFSAdmin command output

comments.body:
Thanks [~ajayydv]. The fix looks good. You'll also need to fix the following test files:
# hadoop-hdfs-project/hadoop-hdfs/src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/hdfs/TestSnapshotCommands.java
# hadoop-hdfs-project/hadoop-hdfs/src/test/resources/testHDFSConf.xml
[~arpitagarwal], thanks for having a look. Added fix for both classes in patch v2.

The remaining UT failures are unrelated.
